issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

assignee.name: knutanders
assignee.emailAddress: knut dot hatlen at oracle dot com

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
See e.g.

]--------------------...>

comments.body:

author.name: olesolberg
author.emailAddress: Ole dot Solberg at Sun dot COM

comments.body:
I was able to reproduce this behaviour also on trunk:

The following classpath was ok:
CLASSPATH=derby.jar:derbyclient.jar:derbytools.jar:derbynet.jar:........

while this one failed the same way:
CLASSPATH=derbyclient.jar:derby.jar:derbytools.jar:derbynet.jar:........

The problem seems to be derbyclient.jar coming before derby.jar.

updateAuthor.name: olesolberg
updateAuthor.emailAddress: Ole dot Solberg at Sun dot COM

author.name: knutanders
author.emailAddress: knut dot hatlen at oracle dot com

comments.body: Kathey's guess was close, but SysinfoTest has its own policy file, so the extra permission must go into SysinfoTest.policy instead of derby_tests.policy. See attached patch.

updateAuthor.name: knutanders
updateAuthor.emailAddress: knut dot hatlen at oracle dot com

author.name: knutanders
